hello.text: I've been stuck like this for days. Can't revert back to normal anymore.

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: Angry. Stuck. Can't even walk or fly straight.

what.name: How did you twist your bones like this ?
what.text: I was laughing at Sekibanki and trying to imitate her with my powers. Bad idea

check.name: Check out her body
check.text: {i}Nothing unusual aside from her face turned backwards.{s}

scanner.name: Use the lunarian scanner
scanner.text: {i}Her bones and ligaments around the neck are twisted. Using her power like this was clearly a bad idea.{s}

scanner.name: Use the lunarian scanner
scanner.text: {i}The damage you did actually helped a bit. Now you should be able to operate her.{s}

punch.name: Punch her head back into place
punch.text: {i}You punch her hard and hear a loud crack. Congratulations, you fractured the bones.{s}

painkillers.text: Pain killers ? No thanks, pain makes me more alive !

operate.text: {i} *It takes you a few hours in the block, but you manage to put back most of her bones in the right place{s}
